sentences.english: Discus throw is an ancient game among the throwing events.
sentences.chinese: 擲鐵餅是投擲項目中一項古老的比賽。

sentences.english: One day Apollo decided to practice throwing the discus.
sentences.chinese: 某天，阿波羅決定練習擲鐵餅。

sentences.english: The discus involves throwing a flat, round object.
sentences.chinese: 擲鐵餅需要擲一個扁而圓的物體。

sentences.english: Events like the hammer and the discus are not traditional crowd-pullers in the West.
sentences.chinese: 擲鏈球和鐵餅等在西方算不上傳統的受歡迎項目。

sentences.english: Remember the famous statue Discobolos, of a man holding an iron disc?
sentences.chinese: 還記得那尊著名的“擲鐵餅者”雕像嗎？

sentences.english: Apollo lifted the discus and threw it high and far in the air.
sentences.chinese: 阿波羅舉起鐵餅向空中擲去擲得又高又遠。

sentences.english: The final exertion is the key stage of the whole technical sequence in discus throw.
sentences.chinese: 擲鐵餅技術的最後用力是整個技術過程的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: On the other side will be an image of an ancient Greek statue of a discus thrower.
sentences.chinese: 另一面則是一個古希臘擲鐵餅者雕塑的圖像。

sentences.english: The young track and field athlete could already hurl the discus 60 yards .
sentences.chinese: 這個年青的田徑運動員已能把鐵餅投擲60碼遠。

sentences.english: He was the first place in the discus throw.

definition: variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]
Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
the spongy, white pulp inside the stem of rush plants, used as a wick for oil lamps
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
Long Xing Quan - "Dragon Fist" - Martial Art
banner/standard/variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
